text: Let go of who you think you’re supposed to be; embrace who you are.
author: Brené Brown

text: Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love.
author: Brené Brown

text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

text: The best fighter is never angry.
author: Lao Tzu

text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
author: Henry Ford

text: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
author: Walter Winchell

text: We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.
author: Albert Einstein

text: When you give joy to other people, you get more joy in return.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
author: Bill Gates

text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Laozi

text: In the face of darkness, let your light shine brighter than ever.
author: Geōrgius Magnus

text: The greatest battles are fought not with swords, but with love and compassion.
author: Geōrgius Magnus

text: Choose love over hatred, and you shall triumph over any adversary.
author: Geōrgius Magnus

text: The strongest armor is built not of steel, but of empathy and understanding.
author: Geōrgius Magnus

text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
author: Vincent van Gogh

text: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: Life isn't about finding yourself, life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: I only achieve simplicity with enormous effort.
author: Clarice Lispector

text: The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you truly are.
author: Carl Jung

text: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

text: Normality is a paved road: it's comfortable to walk, but no flowers grow on it.
author: Vincent van Gogh

text: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
author: William James

text: Do not wait for the right moment. Create it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: A man is not finished when he is defeated. He is finished when he quits.
author: Richard Nixon

text: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
author: Rumi

text: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

text: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
author: Victor Hugo

text: To draw, you must close your eyes and sing.
author: Pablo Picasso

text: Every act of creation is first an act of destruction.
author: Pablo Picasso
